content:
All six accounts are configures identically via IMAP.

I've changed the account settings so as not to fetch emails for all six accounts immediately upon activating T-Bird.

I've changed the times to fetch emails again to random times, 10 to 31 minutes.

Sorry for BOLD dashes above.
creator: TedT_USA

content: On W11, the arrows only appear when the cursor hovers on the spot where they normally appear, so this might also be the case on Linux.
